title: The vvay to true peace and rest Deliuered at Edinborough in xvi. sermons: on the Lords Supper: Hezechiahs sicknesse: and other select Scriptures. By that reuerend & faithfull preacher of Gods word: Mr. Robert Bruce, for the present, minister of the Word in Scotland.
author: Bruce, Robert, 1554-1631.
publisher: Printed by R. Field for Thomas Man and Ionas Man, dwelling in Pater-noster row at the signe of the Talbot,
notes: Consists of a Anglicizations of "Sermons upon the sacrament of the Lords Supper" and "Sermons preached in the Kirk of Edinburgh".
The translator's preface, signed "I.H.", mentions S. Mitchell as the other translator.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
